import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button } from "../ui/button"; const filters = [ "All tickets", "Unassigned tickets", "My open tickets", "Open", "Pending", "Solved", "Closed", "Spam", ]; const tickets = [ { id: 1, requester: "Lisa Goodman", email: "lisagoodman@mail.com", subject: "Shoe size question", assignee: "Patricia", status: "Open", lastMessage: "4 seconds ago", }, { id: 2, requester: "Garrett Richardson", email: "garrettr@company.com", subject: "Order #345098", assignee: "Michael", status: "Open", lastMessage: "45 seconds ago", }, { id: 3, requester: "Austin Burke", email: "aburke@corporate.com", subject: "Happy feedback ðŸ˜Š", assignee: "Dwight", status: "Open", lastMessage: "50 seconds ago", }, { id: 4, requester: "Josephine Knight", email: "josephine@knight.com", subject: "Next license renewal", assignee: "Pam", status: "Solved", lastMessage: "2 hours ago", }, { id: 5, requester: "Frances Brown", email: "brown@frances.com", subject: "Configuration", assignee: "Toby", status: "Pending", lastMessage: "April 16, 2019", }, // Add more tickets as needed... ]; function statusColor(status) { switch (status) { case "Open": return "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700"; case "Solved": return "bg-green-100 text-green-700"; case "Pending": return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-700 border border-gray-300"; case "Spam": return "bg-gray-200 text-gray-500"; case "Closed": return "bg-gray-300 text-gray-600"; default: return "bg-gray-100 text-gray-700"; } } export default function ViewTicketsPage() { const [selectedFilter, setSelectedFilter] = useState("All tickets"); return (
{/* Sidebar */}
Tickets
{filters.map((filter) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}

All tickets

{tickets.map((ticket) => ( ))}
Requester Subject Assignee Status Last Message
{ticket.requester .split(" ") .map((n) => n[0]) .join("") .toUpperCase()}
{ticket.requester}
{ticket.email}
 {ticket.subject} {ticket.assignee} {ticket.status} {ticket.lastMessage}
); }
